ing: 1 (10 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup
1/2 teaspoon garlic salt or minced garlic
2 (10 ounce) packages frozen spinach - thawed, drained and chopped
des: "Dress up this delicious side dish with a sprinkling of Parmesan cheese or bread crumbs, or serve it as is. Always requested at every family gathering, and can be easily made a day ahead and popped into the oven just before serving!"
ins:
Heat soup in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir in flour, butter, garlic salt, and salt and pepper.
Stir in spinach and onion; cook until onion softens, 7 to 10 minutes. Serve warm.
